unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with new wheels!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with new wheels!

unnormalised: First off, Mahindra just dropped the Thar 5-door bomb. It’s bigger, bolder, and ready to conquer even Ladakh’s toughest terrains. Expecting prices around Rs. 15 Lakhs, making it accessible to more desi adventurers.
normalised: First off, Mahindra just dropped the Thar five-door bomb. It’s bigger, bolder, and ready to conquer even Ladakh’s toughest terrains. Expecting prices around rupee fifteen lakh, making it accessible to more desi adventurers.

unnormalised: Tata Motors isn't sitting still either. Rumors are swirling about a facelifted Nexon EV with increased range – think tackling Mumbai to Pune on a single charge!
normalised: Tata Motors isn't sitting still either. Rumors are swirling about a facelifted Nexon E V with increased range – think tackling Mumbai to Pune on a single charge!

unnormalised: And let's not forget the luxury segment. Mercedes-Benz is teasing a new EQS SUV launch, promising a palatial cabin with enough legroom to do yoga. Perfect for those long Delhi commutes! It's rumored to have park assist which parks the car within a 100 sq ft area.
normalised: And let's not forget the luxury segment. Mercedes-Benz is teasing a new E Q S S U V launch, promising a palatial cabin with enough legroom to do yoga. Perfect for those long Delhi commutes! It's rumored to have park assist which parks the car within a one hundred square feet area.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Dr. Agarwal from IIT Madras is developing some seriously cool autonomous tech, which could be integrated into future Maruti Suzuki models. Imagine, navigating Bengaluru traffic hands-free!
normalised: Meanwhile, Doctor Agarwal from I I T Madras is developing some seriously cool autonomous tech, which could be integrated into future Maruti Suzuki models. Imagine, navigating Bengaluru traffic hands-free!

unnormalised: With all this action, seems like Diwali came early for car lovers! Keep your eyes peeled for more updates.
normalised: With all this action, seems like Diwali came early for car lovers! Keep your eyes peeled for more updates.
